original_text:
A man is commended according to his good sense,
    but one of twisted mind is despised.
korean_text: 사람은 그 지혜대로 칭찬을 받으려니와 마음이 굽은 자는 멸시를 받으리라

sentences.original_text: A man is commended according to his good sense
but one of twisted mind is despised.
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 마음이 비뚤어진 사람은 멸시를 받습니다.
